body.name: Fresh Wave Lemon Odor Removing Gel, 7 oz. | Pack of 3 | Safer Odor Absorbers for Home | Natural Plant-Based Odor Eliminator | Every 7 oz. lasts 15-30 Days | For Cooking, Trash & Pets
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 53 mins
features: Clear the air and absorb ongoing odors with Fresh Wave Gel. The Gel evaporates as it erases odors in your home.
A 7 oz Gel typically lasts about 15-30 days, depending on the strength of the odors. When you run low, you can refresh your jar with our easy refills.
We never use parabens, sulfates, phthalates, or harsh chemicals in our products, making them safer than traditional air fresheners. Our natural chemistry is safe for people, pets, and the planet.
Our gels harness the power of lemon, lime, pine needle, clove, anise, cedarwood, and lavender oils, naturally combating odors at their source.
Keep a Lemon Gel in any small space with big odors, like cars, boats, RVs, closets, and pet areas to freshen up the air.
We’ve got a new look! Inside it’s still the same Fresh Wave you know and love. You may get a mix of new and old packaging for a short time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Real Lemon Oil, Real Odor Relief Save space without compromising on freshness! Fresh Wave's 7 oz Lemon Gel, made with real lemon oil and natural ingredients, delivers powerful, ongoing odor relief with a citrus twist.

Previous page 24/7 Odor Relief Refresh Small Spaces with Lemon Powerful odor control in a convenient 7 oz size. Instantly refresh your spaces with clean chemistry. Defeat Odors with Citrus Solve Airborne Odors with Gel Absorb odors in kitchens and rooms with clean ingredients and no harsh chemicals. Last 30-60 days. Bulk Lemon Freshness Refill and Refresh with Lemon Gel Economical and powerful, our 63 oz Gel Refill ensures bulk odor control with plant-based magic. Non-Stop Odor Relief Tough on Odors, Gentle on Your Senses 2 Gallons of Lemon Gel will help you refill your jars for continuous freshness around the home. Next page 1 7 oz 2 15 oz 3 63 oz 4 248 oz

Our formula finds the odors in your home Find Our science is simple and has been proven effective with the toughest odors. Our formula attracts and contacts odor molecules, so that they can be eliminated at the source. You won’t be “masking” odors when you use Fresh Wave. You’ll be getting rid of them for good. Our ingredients bind to odor molecules Bind Through a process known as adsorption, our plant-based ingredients surround those smelly odor molecules. This creates a shield around the smell, so that our natural chemistry can work its wonders. Our products get to the root of the problem and leave your space fresher than ever. We eliminate the smell completely. No "cover ups" Leave Nothing Behind The final step is absorption. Our natural chemistry neutralizes the odors in your home so that they no longer stink. All you’re left with is a breath of fresh air. No fake fragrance. No harsh chemicals. No overwhelming perfume. Instead, your rooms will smell as fresh and light as they did before the odors.
Lemon Bright and zesty A light, citrus scent made with real lemon oil. The scent fades away as odors are absorbed, leaving your space sunny and bright.
The "set it and forget it" method How to use Gels Twist off lidRemove foil sealReplace slotted lidPlace Gel in the space where odors are strongReplace or refill every 15-30 days

Zest Up Your Kitchens with Lemon Gel The secret ingredient to fresher kitchens? Meet our 7 oz Lemon Gel! The Gel absorbs daily odors in your cooking spaces and fits easily on your counters. All with clean, plant-based ingredients. Fresh Air You Can Savor Transform your dining space with our 7 oz Lemon Gel. Effortlessly neutralize odors, creating a fresh and inviting atmosphere. Plant-based and natural, so you can focus on your delicious meals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2022
reviews.reviewText: There is an odd smell in my mudroom that is amplified in the summer. Last year I purchased these in the Original Scent. At first the scent was overpowering and not so great, but it dissipated and they definitely absorbed the negative odor. I decided to try the Lemon Scent this summer and I love it! It is very strong in the beginning and does fade, but it does what it's supposed to do, absorb bad odors. It does not cover up odors with another scent, which is why the scent fades. I have started using these in the lobby of my doggie daycare which obviously can smell very "doggie" and they really help! Love that it is a natural product too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells Fresh • Kitchen or Bath • inside Litter Robot Drawer
reviews.reviewText: See the end for an update 081722…I got it based on a review on a Litter Robot page review. I expected it to magically remove any odor based on the review. It does smell fresh & good & I put all 3 of them in the closet I have the litter box in. With a litter robot the odor pretty much goes away after it cycles, but in the lapse of time between use & cycling (set at 3 minutes) it can stink up a storm. (Still better than a manual litter box because that stinks until you physically clean it.) One kitty tries to cover his poop but never quite does. The litter robot I love, that’s my only challenge, but it’s a big one for me as my clothes are at the other end. It’s a small apartment and it’s the only logical place for it to be.Still glad I have the 3 odor removing gels for general odor but febreeze works better. I’m just not always around to spray it. Would I buy them again for this specific use? Maybe not. I’ll know for sure when they evaporate all the gel and see then if it made a difference. Anyone have a better resource?For a bathroom or kitchen, I think they’ll work better.Update: I put the containers inside the front of my litter robot drawer, in front of the bag. I really think that relocation helped with the freshener’s effectiveness. Try it, see if it works for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The scent is very nice. It really works well to eliminate pet orders. Considering subscribing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The scent does not last....
reviews.reviewText: My order arrived in tact, it wasnt leaking or broken, like the other reviews I have read. When you open it the smell is great but I found that the scent does not last or you can't even smell it at all. I have one on the bathroom and the kitchen it doesn't freshen the air or even mask the odors. I don't know if I would need more than one in those spaces 🤷🏽‍♀️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does NOT work
reviews.reviewText: I used it in our bathroom next to the car liter box. It did not help at all. After 3 weeks I opened a second one, but there was no improvement. Wasted money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These have been a game changer, absolutely love them, they are very effective. I bought the lemon and love it so much I haven’t even tried the other scents yet. Highly recommend!
